E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 7/31/1991
Subject: Successful Promotion Day
Hello,
That was quite a nice game, the fans loved it!
It seems that the promotion was a success, our
fan interest increased!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Saturday, 8/2/1991
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Rich Gossage



Date: Thursday, 8/7/1991
Subject: Ralph Bryant
Ralph Bryant is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,
Team Doctor

our team won on a promotion day. Good job!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Monday, 8/25/1991
Subject: Progress of James Baldwin
Dear Sir,
James Baldwin has an ERA of 3.31 at A Winston-Salem Spirits!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
